# GCInputDualShockTouchpadButton

**Global Variable**

The name of the button functionality of the DualShock 4 touchpad.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputDualShockTouchpadButton: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **touchpadButton**: The button element on the touchpad of the controller.

## DualShock controller button names

- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadOne**: The name of the first finger element to touch down on the DualShock 4 touchpad.
- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadTwo**: The name of the second finger element to touch down on the DualShock 4 touchpad.
